oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from James B. Owen to Sarah Bell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Partial letter from Pvt. James B. Owen, Co. D, 31st Ill. Inf. Regt., USA to Sarah Bell. He sends $30.00 along with his letter saying that he has enough for his own use. He writes that he has no news, and that he does not know; if they will go up the river, or down, or stay. He will send more money when he is paid. Owen was from Brownsville, Ill. and died Sept. 3, 1863.
